verses.verse: "Come, <WH1945> everyone who thirsts, <WH6771> to the waters! <WH4325> Come, <WH3212> he who has no money, <WH3701> buy, <WH7666> and eat! <WH398> Yes, <WH3212> come, buy <WH7666> wine <WH3196> and milk <WH2461> without money <WH3701> and without price. <WH4242>

Why do you spend <WH8254> money <WH3701> for that which is not bread? <WH3899> and your labor <WH3018> for that which doesn't <WH3808> satisfy? <WH7654> listen <WH8085> diligently <WH8085> to me, <WH398> and eat you that which is good, <WH2896> and let your soul <WH5315> delight <WH6026> itself in fatness. <WH1880>

Turn <WH5186> your ear, <WH241> and come <WH3212> to me; <WH8085> hear, and your soul <WH5315> shall live: <WH2421> and I will make <WH3772> an everlasting <WH5769> covenant <WH1285> with you, <WH539> even the sure mercies <WH2617> of David. <WH1732>
Behold, <WH5414> I have given him for a witness <WH5707> to the peoples, <WH3816> a leader <WH5057> and commander <WH6680> to the peoples. <WH3816>

Behold, <WH7121> you shall call a nation <WH1471> that you don't <WH3045> know; and a nation <WH1471> that didn't <WH3045> know you shall run <WH7323> to you, <WH3068> because of Yahweh your God, <WH430> and for the Holy One <WH6918> of Israel; <WH3478> for he has glorified you. <WH6286>"
Seek <WH1875> Yahweh <WH3068> while he may be found; <WH4672> call <WH7121> you on him while he is near: <WH7138>

let the wicked <WH7563> forsake <WH5800> his way, <WH1870> and the unrighteous <WH205> man <WH376> his thoughts; <WH4284> and let him return <WH7725> to Yahweh, <WH3068> and he will have mercy <WH7355> on him; <WH430> and to our God, for he will abundantly <WH7235> pardon. <WH5545>
"For my thoughts <WH4284> are not your thoughts, <WH4284> neither are your ways <WH1870> my ways, <WH1870>" says <WH5002> Yahweh. <WH3068>
"For as the heavens <WH8064> are higher <WH1361> than the earth, <WH776> so are my ways <WH1870> higher <WH1361> than your ways, <WH1870> and my thoughts <WH4284> than your thoughts. <WH4284>

For as the rain <WH1653> comes down <WH3381> and the snow <WH7950> from the sky, <WH8064> and doesn't <WH7725> return there, <WH7301> but waters the earth, <WH776> and makes it bring forth <WH3205> and bud, <WH6779> and gives <WH5414> seed <WH2233> to the sower <WH2232> and bread <WH3899> to the eater; <WH398>

so shall my word <WH1697> be that goes forth <WH3318> out of my mouth: <WH6310> it shall not return <WH7725> to me void, <WH7387> but it shall accomplish <WH6213> that which I please, <WH2654> and it shall prosper <WH6743> in the thing I sent it to do. <WH7971>

For you shall go out <WH3318> with joy, <WH8057> and be led forth <WH2986> with peace: <WH7965> the mountains <WH2022> and the hills <WH1389> shall break forth <WH6476> before <WH6440> you into singing; <WH7440> and all the trees <WH6086> of the fields <WH7704> shall clap <WH4222> their hands. <WH3709>

Instead of the thorn <WH5285> shall come up <WH5927> the fir tree; <WH1265> and instead of the brier <WH5636> shall come up <WH5927> the myrtle tree: <WH1918> and it shall be to Yahweh <WH3068> for a name, <WH8034> for an everlasting <WH5769> sign <WH226> that shall not be cut off. <WH3772>"
